channel.title: Python – CryptoidCoder
channel.description: If it’s stupid and it works, it’s not stupid

item.title: Techno
item.dc:creator: Webmaster
item.description: URL: https://github.com/CryptoidCoder/Techno About: A Virtual Assistant made using python. Branches: main– Has local Setup (main branch):…
item.content:encoded:
URL:

https://github.com/CryptoidCoder/Techno

About:

A Virtual Assistant made using python.

Branches:

  • main– Has local

Setup (main branch):

pip install -r requirements.txt

./venv/Scripts/python.exe setup.py

Run (main branch):

./venv/Scripts/python.exe main.py

item.title: HTML-website
item.dc:creator: Webmaster
item.description: URL: https://github.com/CryptoidCoder/HTML-website About: A HTML & Python based blog site, where Git would play a large…
item.content:encoded:
URL:

https://github.com/CryptoidCoder/HTML-website

About:

A HTML & Python based blog site, where Git would play a large part in publishing new posts.

Branches:

main – Has Everything On It

Setup:

pip install -r requirements.txt

Run:

./venv/Scripts/python.exe file.py – where file.py is the file you want to run.

Designed For Use With The Procfile In Heroku
